description:
Certainly! Here are the project details broken down into clear bullet points:
- Developed a full-stack web application, integrating FastAPI for the backend and Next.js for the frontend.
- Focused on a computer vision-driven machine learning model, testing and refining multiple model variants and training datasets over several months.
- Enhanced application performance by identifying and implementing key features essential to the machine learning model.
- Expanded web application functionalities including advanced state management and facilitating communications between multiple servers.
- Handled deployment on AWS and integrated Supabase for user authentication, ensuring robust security measures.
- Documented the entire project comprehensively, detailing development processes and operational guidelines.
- Delivered two detailed presentations to train new team members, ensuring knowledge transfer and project continuity.
